ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Digest Number 182
ygData.msgSnippet: My Erudite Shadowknight is level 35 in all darkforge. When I do use the Sword/Shield combo, I use a Runed Falchion which looks impressive with the +9str shield
ygData.messageBody:
My Erudite Shadowknight is level 35 in all darkforge. When I do use the
Sword/Shield combo, I use a Runed Falchion which looks impressive with the
+9str shield (forgot the name). I get comments often how my appearence is
wherever I go.
I do not think you can go wrong with that combination. it is like a 11dmg 33
dly sword. Fast and hits hard. Double 36's is nice for damage.


Isasnick Alric - Innoruuk
Dawn of the Phoenix
35th Tier - Erudite Shadowknight.
